column4: Hey, I got several "startup applications" tray icons missing, for example: "Bluetooth Manager" and "Network Manager" bar icons are missing. how to fix it?
did you try to remove pulseaudio?
no, that is just a common cause. try going into your package manager, finding ubuntu-dektop and reinstalling it
nah, i've done it 5 times trying to troubleshoot a bug i am having just in the past 24 hours
